ibis.io

Class DataOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • ibis.io.DataOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataOutput, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedArrayOutputStream, DataOutputStreamSplitter, SingleBufferArrayOutputStream

    public abstract class DataOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
implements DataOutput
    A general data output stream. Provides methods to write data to an underlying implementation. Data written to the stream may NOT be touched until after the flush() method is called, and the finished() method has indicated that the data may be touched again. The write methods from java.io.OutputStream are an exception to this rule: arrays written using these methods can be touched again immediately, so that no extra demands are required when regarding a DataOutputStream as a java.io.OutputStream.

        public abstract long bytesWritten()
        Returns the number of bytes that was written to the stream, in the stream dependent format. This is the number of bytes that will be sent over the network.
